text:
@RealJamesWoods The entire Covid-19 narrative has absolutely no basis in science whatsoever. Covid-19 hijacks all other illnesses to legitimize itself. It's the vehicle via which tyrants are trying to impose Socialism, Population Control & Eugenics on the whole world.
#FakeDisease #FakePandemic
